title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average attendance, with a total of 12 data points.
Overall Average attendance has decreased over the Year
Average attendance is roughly constant from 2008 to 2019.
The steepest stays the same occurs in between the Year 2016 and 2017.
Max Average attendance about 69487.0 was recorded at Year 2016
Min Average attendance about 66151.0 was recorded at Year 2019
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average attendance, with a total of 12 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2016 to 2019.
Differently, the next significant trend is extremely decreasing which exists from 2013 to 2016.
Differently, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2010 to 2013.
Also, the next significant trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2008 to 2010.
